Conflicting Roles

Beauty Shop, 2005 (3.72 MB)

"You don't get to give shots here at Jorge's.  I give the shots.  The stylists here, they work for me.  They don't work for you."  

 

Sometimes we have to perform a task that's outside our normal role or responsibilities. If this causes us to step into someone else's "territory," then conflict and power struggles can occur.

 

The same can happen in reverse.   Sometimes we may feel that a particular task should be completed by someone else.
